sys_ux_client_script.name: listSetPrefState

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes>e75113c0c3302010de10a0f89d40dd0e</includes><macroponent display_value="List">4bc514fa47ae021025e7b4b4116d4308</macroponent><name>listSetPrefState</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    if (event.payload.interaction === "USER_ACTION") {
        const listDividerPosition = event.payload.dividerPosition;
        const listPreference = api.state.listRatioPreference;
        
        api.setState('listDividerPosition', listDividerPosition);

        api.data.setListPreference.execute({
            'name': listPreference,
            'value': listDividerPosition
        });    
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-06 01:43:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>1fc510be47ae021025e7b4b4116d4329</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>listSetPrefState</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Raposa Aí Reviews" source="x_1300284_raposa_0">d611c33d4746421025e7b4b4116d439c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Raposa Aí Reviews">d611c33d4746421025e7b4b4116d439c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1fc510be47ae021025e7b4b4116d4329</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-06 01:43:11</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
